Title: Joint IDF and and ISA announcement: Yahya Sinwar, the leader of t...
Description: Joint IDF and and ISA announcement: Yahya Sinwar, the leader of the Hamas terrorist organization who was responsible for planning and executing the October 7th Massacre, has been eliminated The IDF and ISA confirm that after a year-long pursuit, yesterday (Wednesday), October 16, 2024, IDF soldiers from the Southern Command eliminated Yahya Sinwar, the leader of the Hamas terrorist organization, in an operation in the southern Gaza Strip. Yahya Sinwar planned and executed the October 7th Massacre, promoted his murderous ideology both before and during the war, and was responsible for the murder and abduction of many Israelis.Yahya Sinwar was eliminated after hiding for the past year behind the civilian population of Gaza, both above and below ground in Hamas tunnels in the Gaza Strip. The dozens of operations carried out by the IDF and the ISA over the last year, and in recent weeks in the area where he was eliminated, restricted Yahya Sinwar’s operational movement as he was pursued by the forces and led to his elimination.In recent weeks, IDF and ISA forces, under the command of the Southern Command, have been operating in the southern Gaza Strip, following IDF and ISA intelligence that indicated the suspected locations of senior members of Hamas. IDF soldiers of the 828th Brigade (Bislach) operating in the area identified and eliminated three terrorists. After completing the process of identifying the body, it can be confirmed that Yahya Sinwar was eliminated.

Title: 🖼 🚨BREAKING: Israel has confirmed, that Hamas arch terrorist, Y...
Description: 🚨BREAKING: Israel has confirmed, that Hamas arch terrorist, Yahya Sinwar, one of the worst and most wanted terrorists of the modern era, has been eliminated. Thanks to Israel’s actions, the world is now a safer place.

At this stage, the identity of the terrorists cannot be confirmed.In the building where the terrorists were eliminated, there were no signs of the presence of hostages in the area. The forces that are operating in the area are continuing to operate with the required caution.More details to follow.

Description: In July, 2024, a group of innocent children in a Druze community in northern Israel, went to play soccer in their neighborhood’s field. Families, fathers, mothers, lost everything that day, as terror group Hezbollah from Lebanon decided the children were a legitimate target, firing several rockets to the area. 1 rocket directly hit, murdering 12 of the innocent young souls. Many were injured. Now, a few months after that horrific day, the IDF has eliminated the Hezbollah monster responsible for the horrendous attack that left a nation in shock and grief. May the memories of Alma, John, Yazan, Amir, Naji, Finis, Millar, Hazem, Izil, Fajr, Nazem and Jifara, forever be a blessing. 🕯️

Description: IDF: Over the past hour, two UAVs were identified crossing from Lebanon. The IAF intercepted a UAV off the coast of Nahariya and a fallen projectile was identified in an open area. No injuries were reported. No sirens were sounded in accordance with protocol.Following the sirens that sounded in the Upper Galilee area, approximately 25 projectiles were identified crossing from Lebanon. Some of the projectiles were intercepted and fallen projectiles were identified.

Description: 🚨BREAKING: As families come together to celebrate Rosh Hashanah (the Jewish new year), approximately 140 rockets were launched by Hezbollah terrorists from Lebanon toward northern Israeli communities this evening.

Title: 🖼 We are heartbroken to report on the death of 7 additional IDF ...
Description: We are heartbroken to report on the death of 7 additional IDF soldiers: 🕯️Captain Harel Etinger (23)🕯️Sergeant First Class Noam Barzilay (22)🕯️Captain Itai Ariel Giat (23)🕯️First Sergeant Ido Broyer (21)🕯️First Sergeant Almken Terefe (21)🕯️Sergeant First Class Or Mantzur (21)🕯️Sergeant First Class Nazar Itkin (21)They were killed during the current operation against Hezbollah terrorists in Lebanon. Captain Harel Etinger’s father, Rabbi Achiad Etinger, was murdered in a terror attack in 2019. May their memories forever be a blessing. 🕯️

Title: 🖼 We are heartbroken to report on the death of an additional IDF...
Description: We are heartbroken to report on the death of an additional IDF soldier: 🕯️Captain Eitan Itzhak Oster (22)Eitan was killed in the Lebanon during the current operation against Hezbollah terrorists. He is the first IDF soldier killed in Lebanon since the start of ground operation. May his memory forever be a blessing. 🕯️

Description: WATCH: Everything you need to know about what happened in Israel on the evening of October 1. This should not be anyone’s reality.

Title: IDF: Following a situational assessment, it was decided that as o...
Description: IDF: Following a situational assessment, it was decided that as of today at 00:00 (Wednesday), changes will be made to the Home Front Command’s defensive guidelines.As part of the changes, it was decided to ease restrictions in the areas of Carmel (excluding Daliyat al-Karmel and Isfiya), Wadi Ara (excluding the Megiddo Regional Council and Yokne'am Illit), Menashe, Samaria, Sharon, Dan, Yarkon, Shefala, Jerusalem and Shefla.The rest of the country remains under the guidelines previously issued by the Home Front Command.

Description: StandWithUs - Breaking News: We are heartbroken to report that 6 people have been murdered in the horrific terror attack in Yafo, central Israel. May their memories forever be a blessing.🕯️ UPDATE: The number of people murdered in this horrific terror attack has risen to 7, with 8 more people injured.
